timeline.message:
use maven to package docs

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>

timeline.author: bradh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,9 +11,22 @@ To build:
 
     mvn clean install
 
+To package documentation into zip archives:
+
+    mvn assembly:single
+
+### REST API
+
 To generate the REST API documentation:
 
     mvn process-resources
+    
+To generate a specific REST API endpoint:
+
+    mvn process-resoruces:system-status

timeline.bodyText: Do we actually need this file?
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: We need a file (or the tool makes a needless  warming) because the folder is not created yet.
replies.author: jodygarnett

timeline.bodyText: I think I liked the original version better. Not a big deal though.
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: I had a lot of cut and paste to get through :)
replies.author: jodygarnett

timeline.bodyText: I do see that file used here, but I don't see the override entries in it.
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: It is just a workaround for the tool see - OpenAPITools/openapi-generator#4627
replies.author: jodygarnett

timeline.bodyText: Do we still want the HTML here?
timeline.author: bradh

timeline.bodyText: Do we still want the HTML here?
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: No I moved it up as common configuration, thanks for the catch.
replies.author: jodygarnett

timeline.bodyText: Seems like this is broader than just coverages.
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I stole one of the generated files as an example.
replies.author: jodygarnett

timeline.message:
include version information in documentation builds

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>

Use htmldoc assembly if available, fallback to manual zip

Signed-off-by: Jody Garnett <jody.garnett@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This entire pull request is to enable this one line
timeline.author: jodygarnett
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -309,27 +312,31 @@ popd > /dev/null
 
 pushd $artifacts > /dev/null
 
-# setup doc artifacts
-if [ -e user ]; then
+htmldoc=geoserver-$tag-htmldoc.zip
+
+if [ -e ../../../doc/en/target/$htmldoc ]; then
+  # use assembly
+  cp ../../../doc/en/target/$htmldoc $htmldoc

timeline.bodyText:
host is duplicated here, this has broken the hosted rest docs: https://docs.geoserver.org/latest/en/api/#1.0.0/featuretypes.yaml

Parser error
duplicated mapping key
timeline.author: tbarsballe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,11 @@ info:
   version: 1.0.0
   title: GeoServer Feature Types
   description: A feature type is a vector based spatial resource or data set that originates from a data store. In some cases, such as with a shapefile, a feature type has a one-to-one relationship with its data store. In other cases, such as PostGIS, the relationship of feature type to data store is many-to-one, feature types corresponding to a table in the database.
+  contact:
+    name: GeoServer
+    email: 'geoserver-users@sourceforge.net'
+    url: 'http://geoserver.org/comm/'
+host: localhost:8080
 host: localhost:8080
